name: AM - The Advance Manager
short_description:
The idea to create the tool was born due to the fact that I've given a colleage every day advances in the corporate restaurant. At first, I tracked these meal advances on a piece of paper. Later I entered every amount in an Excel sheet.
 
But both ways were not really satisifying. Sometimes I forgot after the launch break to mark down the advance, how much my colleage has borrowed, and sometimes to mark down how much my colleage had payed me back.
 
So, I thought that it should be the easiest thing to enter this information just in time, right at the moment. The idea of the Advance Manager was born...


This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/.
summary: Keeps track of and manages the advances you gave to others.

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
